item.title: Post Ideas
item.description: Biopolitics is the health of the state Or, public health with Chinese characteristics State makes us cyborgs Fortune telling and modernity Effective distance: how SF is closer to NYC than to Boise Gender thoughts 1910 Pneumatic Plague in Manchuria Recovering files from a penguin container in Crostini Short tour of LXC for Crostini Networking in Crostini Gutta Percha, empire, and information Centralization and homogenization Construction of national cuisines Internet as a similar process, homogenization process Broadcast domains Hard problems in statemaking: naming things
